title: Caterpillar C5000 4600 Lb Capacity Propane Forklift
item_description:
Caterpillar C5000 4600 Lb Capacity Propane Forklift

Note: Forklift has been reserved by Auctioneer and will be available for pickup by appointment only on Monday, December 23rd, 2024 from 3:00 pm - 3:30 pm. This unit will be used during the removal period, therefore the hours below are an approximate guideline.

  • Manufacturer: Caterpillar
  • Model: C5000
  • Load Capacity: 4,600 Lbs
  • Fuel Type: Propane
  • Mast Type: Three Stage
  • Hour Meter Reads: 11,440
  • Serial Number: AT9005213
  • Overall Width: 43”
  • Overall Length: 132”
  • Overall Height: 86”
  • Truck Weight: 8,920 Lbs
  • Tread Width: 6.5”
  • Tire Type: Solid Rubber
  • Number of Front Tires: 2
  • Front Tire Size: 21x7x15
  • Number of Rear Tires: 2
  • Rear Tire Size: 16x6x10
  • Maximum Lift Height: 199”
  • Fork Length: 42”
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Condition: Used
  • Starts: Yes
  • Propane Tank NOT Included
  • Removal Note: this lot is to be picked up last day of removal.
